subject: Re: [junit] How to test an EJB?
msgSnippet: Use EJBUnit... ... -- Kol tov, André L. A. Duque [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
messageBody:
Use EJBUnit...

On 6/7/06, J. B. Rainsberger <jbrains@...> wrote:
>
> saibabu_valluripalli wrote:
>
> > I started exploring on JUnit, Can any one help me on unit testing EJB?
> > Thank you very much in advance.
>
> _JUnit Recipes_ has an entire chapter on testing EJBs. It's 75 pages
> long, which should tell you that "Testing EJBs" is a big subject. If you
> make your question more specific, we can start to answer it.
>
> * What kind of EJB?
> * What are you trying to test? Integration with JNDI? with a database?
> business logic?
> ...
>
> Take care.
> --
> J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger :: http://www.jbrains.info
> Your guide to software craftsmanship
> JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
> 2005 Gordon Pask Award for contribution Agile Software Practice
>
>
>



--
Kol tov,
André L. A. Duque


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
